pages.about-us: About Winning Hotel - Luxury and Comfort in Every Detail Winning Hotel Home About us Casino Discover Winning Hotel From our beautifully designed rooms and suites to our exquisite dining options and exciting activities, everything at Winning Hotel is crafted to ensure your stay is truly unforgettable. Explore the stunning coastline, indulge in a soothing spa treatment, or simply relax by our infinity pool with breathtaking ocean views. Whether you're here for a romantic getaway, a family vacation, or a special celebration, Winning Hotel offers the perfect blend of luxury, comfort, and natural beauty. General information about the hotel Ocean Serenity Suite Indulge in the ultimate luxury with our Ocean Serenity Suite, a sanctuary designed for those seeking tranquility and elegance. This spacious suite features a king-sized bed adorned with premium linens, a separate living area with contemporary decor, and a private balcony that offers breathtaking views of the endless blue sea. The bathroom is a haven of relaxation with a deep soaking tub, a rainfall shower, and bespoke bath amenities. Perfect for romantic getaways, the Ocean Serenity Suite provides an unparalleled experience of comfort and refinement, ensuring that every moment of your stay is filled with peace and serenity. The Seaside Lounge Welcome to The Seaside Lounge, a reception area designed to offer a relaxed and inviting atmosphere with a touch of coastal charm. Situated with direct views of the ocean, The Seaside Lounge features natural wood accents, plush seating, and large windows that flood the space with sunlight and sea breezes. Upon arrival, guests are greeted with a refreshing welcome drink and a warm smile from our attentive staff. This reception area is equipped with a tour desk to help you explore the best of what our stunning location has to offer, from yacht rentals and water sports to cultural experiences and local dining spots. The Seaside Lounge also offers a cozy reading nook with a selection of books and magazines, making it a perfect spot to unwind after a day of adventure. Here, every detail is curated to provide a welcoming and relaxing start to your Winning Hotel experience. The Grand Foyer Step into The Grand Foyer, the elegant gateway to your unforgettable stay at Winning Hotel. This reception area exudes sophistication with its marble floors, soaring ceilings, and contemporary artwork that reflects the natural beauty of our coastal surroundings. Our friendly and professional staff are dedicated to providing a warm welcome and seamless check-in experience, ensuring that your arrival is both smooth and memorable. The Grand Foyer features comfortable seating areas where guests can relax, complimentary refreshments, and a concierge desk ready to assist with any needs or special requests. Whether you're seeking dining recommendations, arranging transportation, or booking local excursions, our team at The Grand Foyer is here to make your stay as pleasant and effortless as possible. Sunset Panorama Suite Embrace the breathtaking beauty of twilight with our Sunset Panorama Suite, a luxurious escape that offers spectacular sunset views over the horizon. This suite features a king-sized bed, a separate living and dining area, and floor-to-ceiling windows that provide an uninterrupted vista of the ocean's splendor. The expansive terrace is perfect for enjoying a glass of wine as you watch the sun dip below the waves. Inside, you'll find a state-of-the-art entertainment system, a mini-bar stocked with premium beverages, and a spa-inspired bathroom with a jacuzzi and dual vanities. The Sunset Panorama Suite is designed for those who appreciate the finer things in life, offering an exquisite setting for unforgettable moments. Coastal Harmony Room Experience the harmonious blend of modern comfort and coastal charm in our Coastal Harmony Room. Thoughtfully designed to reflect the beauty of our seaside location, this room features a plush queen-sized bed, stylish furnishings, and large windows that bathe the space in natural light. Enjoy the convenience of high-speed Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV, and a well-appointed workspace for those who need to stay connected. The private balcony or terrace invites you to unwind with stunning garden or partial ocean views. Ideal for both leisure and business travelers, the Coastal Harmony Room offers a perfect retreat where you can relax and rejuvenate. The Hotel Grounds Winning Hotel is not just a place to stay; it’s an entire coastal oasis waiting to be explored. Our meticulously landscaped grounds are designed to blend seamlessly with the natural beauty of our sun-drenched seaside location. Stroll through lush gardens adorned with vibrant flowers and exotic plants, offering a serene environment that invites relaxation and rejuvenation. Our expansive infinity pool, with its unobstructed views of the sparkling ocean, provides a perfect spot to soak up the sun or take a refreshing dip. Comfortable lounge chairs and shaded cabanas surround the pool, offering an ideal space for guests to unwind with a good book or enjoy a refreshing cocktail from our poolside bar. Our Mission At Winning Hotel, our mission is to provide an exceptional and memorable experience for every guest. We are dedicated to delivering unparalleled hospitality by blending luxurious comfort with genuine, personalized service. Our commitment to excellence is reflected in every aspect of our hotel, from our beautifully designed accommodations and world-class amenities to our meticulously maintained grounds and thoughtfully curated activities. We strive to create a serene and welcoming environment where guests can relax, rejuvenate, and create lasting memories. By fostering a culture of warmth and attentiveness, our team ensures that each guest feels valued and cared for from the moment they arrive. We believe in the power of hospitality to transform ordinary moments into extraordinary experiences. Our mission extends beyond providing luxury and comfort; we are dedicated to making a positive impact on our community and the environment. We practice sustainable and eco-friendly initiatives to preserve the natural beauty of our coastal location for future generations. Our local partnerships and community involvement reflect our commitment to supporting and enriching the region we call home. The Winning Hotel website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. The private balcony or terrace invites you to unwind with stunning garden or partial ocean views. The Hotel Grounds Winning Hotel is not just a place to stay; it’s an entire coastal oasis waiting to be explored. Our meticulously landscaped grounds are designed to blend seamlessly with the natural beauty of our sun-drenched seaside location. Stroll through lush gardens adorned with vibrant flowers and exotic plants, offering a serene environment that invites relaxation and rejuvenation. Comfortable lounge chairs and shaded cabanas surround the pool, offering an ideal space for guests to unwind with a good book or enjoy a refreshing cocktail from our poolside bar. Experience Yacht Rental and Leisure Activities Elevate your seaside adventure with Winning Hotel's exclusive yacht rental services and diverse leisure activities. Our fleet of luxurious yachts is available for private hire, offering you the chance to explore the stunning coastline, secluded coves, and vibrant marine life at your own pace. Whether you're an experienced sailor or a first-time adventurer, our professional team will ensure a safe and exhilarating experience on the open waters. Back on land, our hotel offers a range of activities designed to enhance your stay. Unwind with a soothing massage at our spa, join a yoga session on the beach, or take a dip in our sparkling infinity pool. For those seeking more excitement, we offer guided tours, water sports, and bicycle rentals. Our concierge is always on hand to help you plan your perfect day, from booking excursions to recommending the best local attractions. At Winning Hotel, we cater to every interest, ensuring your time with us is filled with both relaxation and adventure. Exciting Activities at Winning Hotel Yacht Rentals: Set sail on an unforgettable maritime adventure with our exclusive yacht rental service. Whether you’re an experienced sailor or a first-time voyager, our fleet of luxurious yachts offers the perfect opportunity to explore the stunning coastline, discover hidden coves, and enjoy the serene beauty of the open sea. Our experienced crew is on hand to ensure your journey is both safe and exhilarating. Spa and Wellness: Indulge in a world of relaxation and rejuvenation at our luxurious spa. Our comprehensive menu of treatments includes soothing massages, revitalizing facials, and holistic therapies designed to refresh your body and mind. Complement your spa experience with a visit to our sauna, steam room, or Jacuzzi, and let our skilled therapists help you unwind and de-stress. Water Sports: For the adventure seekers, Winning Hotel offers a variety of exciting water sports activities. From jet skiing and parasailing to paddleboarding and kayaking, there’s something for everyone. Our professional instructors provide all the necessary equipment and guidance to ensure a fun and safe experience on the water. Culinary Experiences: Embark on a culinary journey at Winning Hotel, where our world-class chefs prepare a diverse range of gourmet dishes using the freshest local ingredients. Participate in our cooking classes to learn the secrets of Mediterranean cuisine, or enjoy a private dining experience on the beach, under the stars. Our multiple dining venues cater to every palate, offering a delightful array of flavors and cuisines. Cultural Tours: Immerse yourself in the local culture with our guided tours and excursions. Explore nearby historical sites, visit charming coastal villages, and discover the rich heritage of the region. Our knowledgeable guides provide fascinating insights and personalized recommendations, ensuring that every tour is an enriching and memorable experience. Fitness and Recreation: Stay active and energized with our comprehensive fitness and recreation options. Our state-of-the-art fitness center offers a variety of equipment and fitness classes, including yoga and Pilates. Enjoy a game of tennis or beach volleyball, or join one of our guided nature walks to explore the beautiful surroundings. At Winning Hotel, we provide a range of activities to keep you fit and entertained throughout your stay. Meet Our Exceptional Team At Winning Hotel, we pride ourselves on providing an unparalleled level of service, and that starts with our exceptional team. Each member of our staff is committed to ensuring your stay is comfortable, enjoyable, and unforgettable. From the moment you arrive, our friendly and professional team is here to cater to your every need. Experienced Management: Our management team brings years of experience in the hospitality industry, ensuring that every aspect of your stay is meticulously planned and executed. They lead by example, fostering a culture of excellence and attentiveness that permeates every department of our hotel. Their passion for hospitality is evident in every detail, from the immaculate rooms to the beautifully maintained grounds. Front Desk Staff: Our front desk team is your first point of contact at Winning Hotel, and they are dedicated to making your check-in process seamless and welcoming. Knowledgeable and attentive, they are always ready to assist with any inquiries, reservations, or special requests you may have. Whether you need directions to local attractions or recommendations for dining, our front desk staff is here to help. Concierge Services:Our concierge team is your personal guide to exploring the best of our beautiful seaside location. With insider knowledge and a passion for creating unforgettable experiences, they can arrange everything from yacht rentals and spa appointments to cultural tours and dining reservations. Their goal is to tailor your stay to your preferences, ensuring you make the most of your time at Winning Hotel. Book Your Stay at Winning Hotel Prime Seaside Location: Enjoy breathtaking ocean views and direct access to the golden sandy beach. Luxurious Accommodations: Choose from a variety of exquisitely designed rooms and suites, each offering unparalleled comfort and elegance. Exceptional Amenities: Indulge in our infinity pool, world-class spa, gourmet dining, and a range of exciting activities. Personalized Service: Our dedicated staff is committed to making your stay memorable and enjoyable. Ready to escape to a haven of luxury and tranquility? Booking your stay at Winning Hotel is quick and easy. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - Winning Hotel Winning Hotel Home About us Casino Privacy Policy - Winning Hotel On our website For visitors to our website, we use cookies to collect information. Our servers use three different types of cookies: A ‘session-based’ cookie: This type of cookie is only allocated to your computer for the duration of your visit to our website. A session-based cookie helps you move around our website faster and, if you’re a registered customer, it allows us to give you information that is more relevant to you. This cookie automatically expires when you close your browser. A ‘persistent’ cookie: This type of cookie will remain on your computer for a period of time set for each cookie. Flash cookies are also persistent. ‘Analytical’ cookies: This type of cookie allows us to recognize and count the number of visitors to our site and see how visitors use our services. These helps us improve the way our sites work, for example, by ensuring you can find what you are looking for easily. You have the ability to accept or decline cookies. Most web browsers automatically accept cookies, but, if you prefer, you can usually modify your browser setting to decline cookies. The Help menu on the menu bar of most browsers will tell you how to prevent your browser from accepting new cookies, how to have the browser notify you when you receive a new cookie and how to disable cookies altogether. Flash cookies You can modify your Flash Player settings to prevent the use of flash cookies. The Settings Manager of your Flash Player allows you manage your preferences. To disallow flash cookies from all third party content go to the ‘Global Storage Settings’ panel of the Settings Manager and de-select the check box labelled ‘Allow third party flash content to store information on your computer’ and close the Settings Manager. Alternatively you can also adjust your settings for specific websites you visit through the ‘Website Storage Settings’ panel which is also found in the Settings Manager. If you are using an old version of Flash Player or older web browser, the Settings Manager may not be available to you. We recommend that you ensure that you refresh your Flash Player and browser to the latest available versions. If you choose to decline cookies, you may not be able to experience all of the interactive features on our sites. CONSENT TO USE OF ELECTRONIC SERVICE PROVIDERS In order to play real money games on our services, you will be required to send money to and receive money from us. We may use third-party electronic payment systems to process such financial transactions. By accepting this Privacy Policy, you expressly consent to Personal Information necessary for the processing of transactions including, where necessary, the transfer of information outside of your country. We take steps to ensure that our arrangements with payments systems protect your privacy. CONSENT TO SECURITY REVIEW We reserve the right to conduct a security review at any time to validate the registration data provided by you and to verify your use of the services and your financial transactions for potential breach of our Terms and Conditions and of applicable law. By using our services and thereby agreeing to our Terms and Conditions you authorize us to use your Personal Information and to disclose your Personal Information to third parties for the purposes of validating the information you provide during your use of our services, including, where necessary, the transfer of information outside of your country. Security reviews may include but are not limited to ordering a credit report and/or otherwise verifying the information you provide against third-party databases. In addition, to facilitate these security reviews, you agree to provide such information or documentation as we may request. SECURITY We understand the importance of security and the techniques needed to secure information. We store all of the Personal Information we receive directly from you in an encrypted and password-protected database residing within our secure network behind active state-of-the-art firewall software. (Our Services support SSL Version 3 with 128-bit encryption). We also take measures to ensure our subsidiaries, agents, affiliates and suppliers employ adequate security measures. PROTECTION OF MINORS Our Services are not intended for or directed at persons under the age of eighteen (18) (or the lawful age in their respective jurisdiction). Any person who provides their information to us through any part of the services signifies to us that they are eighteen (18) years of age (or the lawful age in their respective jurisdiction) or older. It is our policy to uncover attempts by minors to access our services which may involve having to initiate a security review. If we become aware that a minor has attempted to or has submitted personal information via our services, we will not accept their information and will take steps to purge the information from our records. INTERNATIONAL TRANSFERS Personal Information collected on the services may be stored and processed in any country in which we or our affiliates, suppliers or agents maintain facilities. By using our services, you expressly consent to any transfer of information outside of your country (including to countries that may not be assessed as having adequate privacy laws). Nevertheless, we take steps to ensure that our agents, affiliates and suppliers comply with our standards of privacy regardless of their location. The Winning Hotel website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. pages.products: Winning Hotel Casino - Exciting Games and Live Tournaments Winning Hotel Home About us Casino Welcome to The Grand Casino at Winning Hotel Step into a world of excitement and sophistication at The Grand Casino, where thrill meets elegance in the heart of Winning Hotel. Nestled on the sun-drenched shores, our casino offers a premier gaming experience amidst stunning ocean views. Whether you're a seasoned player or a novice, our state-of-the-art facilities and attentive staff ensure a thrilling and memorable visit. Discover a wide array of games including blackjack, roulette, poker, and an extensive selection of slot machines. Our luxurious surroundings, coupled with impeccable service, create an atmosphere of unparalleled entertainment and relaxation. Enjoy live entertainment, exquisite cocktails, and gourmet dining options—all while experiencing the thrill of winning at The Grand Casino. Come and indulge in the ultimate blend of luxury, excitement, and hospitality at Winning Hotel's premier casino. Your unforgettable gaming adventure awaits. Royal Flush or Twenty-One? Experience Poker and Blackjack at Winning Hotel Poker Step into our dedicated Poker room, where skill meets strategy in an atmosphere of refinement. From thrilling Texas Hold'em tournaments to casual cash games, our tables cater to all levels of expertise. Our professional dealers ensure fair play and an unforgettable experience, surrounded by the breathtaking backdrop of the sea. Blackjack: Experience the thrill of the chase at our Blackjack tables, where every hand could bring you closer to twenty-one. Whether you prefer classic Blackjack or exciting variations, our tables are designed for both enjoyment and strategy. Immerse yourself in the excitement of the game while enjoying the impeccable service and ambiance of Winning Hotel's casino. Classic Reels Experience nostalgia with our collection of classic slot machines. Featuring traditional symbols and straightforward gameplay, these timeless favorites offer a chance to win big in an atmosphere of vintage allure. Pull the lever and feel the thrill of the reels spinning towards your next win. Video Slots: Immerse yourself in the cutting-edge excitement of video slots at Winning Hotel. From vibrant graphics and immersive themes to bonus rounds and interactive features, our video slots deliver an unparalleled gaming experience. Discover themed adventures, cinematic storytelling, and the potential for lucrative rewards with every spin. Classic Roulette: Enjoy the timeless elegance of Classic Roulette at Winning Hotel. Place your bets on the iconic red and black numbers, and watch as the ball spins around the wheel. Our professional croupiers ensure a seamless and fair game, while you soak in the excitement and thrill of each spin. European Roulette: Experience the sophistication of European Roulette, renowned for its single zero wheel and favorable odds. Delight in the strategic gameplay and immersive atmosphere as you place your bets on numbers, colors, or even and odd combinations. The allure of European Roulette lies in its simplicity and potential for generous payouts. Access to the site is available only to persons over 18 years of age. Please confirm that you are 18 years of age or older and higher. We promote responsible gambling behavior and recommend gambling in moderation.
